commit.message:
relax timing race in event_reactor test (#345)

* relax timing race in event_reactor test

* add asserts to every stage

* retry the test 1000 times to check if it still flakes

* Revert "retry the test 1000 times to check if it still flakes"

This reverts commit 397e3c364635ba24cf7833dd61680811fd12843f.

rename rc -> completed (#235)

Also, don't check if check_call returns None. It never does.

* return rc from _undo_develop

* document return type

* use completed for returned value
